titleInfo.title: Silva v. Higgins, et al
titleInfo.subTitle: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER ordering the State, within 10 days, to either produce copies of all documents regarding Petitioner's May 16, 1999 and June 14, 1999 incarcerations or file a response to Petitioner's Motion outlining the basis for its objection to production of the requested documents. Signed by Magistrate Judge Lincoln D. Almond on 9/6/05. Forwarded to all counsel of record. (Theall, Jeannine)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 1:04-cv-00361; Silva v. Higgins, et al;

titleInfo.title: Silva v. Higgins, et al
titleInfo.subTitle: REPORT AND RECOMMENDATIONS recommending that the Defendants' Motions to Dismiss (#43,44,50,51) be Granted, and Silva's Amended Petition be Dismissed in its entirety. This Court also recommends that Silva's numerous other pending Motions (30,32,35,38,39,40,41,42,52,55,56) all be Denied as moot in view of this recommended disposition and that Final Judgment be entered in favor of Defendants 43 MOTION to Dismiss filed by Attorney General for the State of Rhode Island,, 42 MOTION for Copies of Pleadings filed by James J. Silva,, 30 Motion for Miscellaneous ReliefMotion to Amend/CorrectMotion for Miscellaneous ReliefMotion for Declaratory JudgmentMotion for Permanent InjunctionMotion for TRO filed by James J. Silva,, 41 MOTION for Default Judgment as to filed by James J. Silva,, 44 MOTION to Dismiss filed by Attorney General for the State of Rhode Island,, 39 MOTION for Removal filed by James J. Silva,, 38 MOTION filed by James J. Silva,, 52 MOTION for a Court Order filed by James J. Silva,, 56 MOTION to Expand the Record re 55 MOTION for Immediate Habeas Corpus Relief, to Sensure Asst. Attorney General Steven A. Regime, for an Immediate Conference with Judge, and to Expand the Record filed by James J. Silva,, 40 MOTION for an Order granting Petitioner's June 23, 2005 Motion to Seize Jurisdiction for Pre-trial Habeas Corpus Relief filed by James J. Silva,, 55 MOTION for Immediate Habeas Corpus Relief, to Sensure Asst. Attorney General Steven A. Regime, for an Immediate Conference with Judge, and to Expand the Record filed by James J. Silva,, 35 MOTION to Sieze Jurisdiction for Pre-trial Habeas Corpus Relief filed by James J. Silva,, 32 Motion for JoinderMotion for Miscellaneous ReliefMotion to CompelMotion to Appoint CounselMotion to CompelMotion to Amend/CorrectMotion for Extension of Time filed by James J. Silva, Objections to R&R due by 12/13/2005. Signed by Magistrate Judge Lincoln D. Almond on 11/29/05. Sent to parties.(Theall, Jeannine)

Silva, 57 Report and Recommendations. Signed by Judge William E Smith on 1/26/06. (mailed to ptf. and faxed to defts.)(Mercurio, Alba-Sue)
